notes: My first job, using Ruby (my love!), first projects with JS. Acting as a project manager.
Started as a Java developer - building all that huge ERP, B2B systems using JBoss, EJB etc. Then switched to writing Javascript and stucked there for next 6 years (at present moment)
Great way to learn something new. Different tasks every day, working at night to get into customer timezone. Selling Javascript as my major skill.
Developing Zapatec AJAX Suite - commercial Javascript framework with very handy widgets. Opened an R&D office in Chernivtsi, Ukraine. Growing the team up to 12 developers.
Funambol acquired Zapatec and we concentrated on building solid web 2.0 app for working with phone sync data. Try it live. Still managing ukrainian R&D office.

After Funambol my team started working for Appcelerator. We've created environment for creating, managing and running black-box tests for mobile applications. Also in a very short term developed HTML5 Mobile Web SDK for running your Titanium projects inside browser.
Frontend development. Automating data export from Photoshop using PS Scripting
Developing browser-based slot machine. Designing scalable and easy to extend architecture to develop numerous games on top of it.
Building project architecture for new projects from scratch. Working in a team with backend developers and designers to quickly bring online modern and easy to use web services.
